name: High Jump
description: Second jump provides maximum height at the cost of horizontal control.

name: Strafe Jump
description: Second jump with strong directional control, sacrificing some height.

name: Triple Jump
description: Allows up to three air impulses, gaining distance and control at the cost of height.

name: Blink
description: Short teleport instead of normal jump. Only available on the Void (Nightstalker) subclass.

name: High Lift
description: Activates Lift in the air, providing maximum height with limited horizontal control.

name: Strafe Lift
description: Lift with better directional control, sacrificing height.

name: Catapult Lift
description: Lift with a very strong initial impulse, providing good speed but less fine control.

name: Strafe Glide
description: Glide with good directional control and moderate speed.

name: Burst Glide
description: Glide with an initial burst of very high speed, less fine control.

name: Balanced Glide
description: Balanced mix of speed and control in the air.

name: Blink
description: Short teleport instead of glide. Only available on Voidwalker subclass.

name: Icarus Dash
description: Aerial dash in Dawnblade (Solar), allows double or triple impulses in the air.

name: Thruster
description: Lateral or forward dash on the ground for quick repositioning. Available on Striker (Arc) variants.
